Name: Assail
Description: A basic attack that deals a small amount of damage to an enemy immediately in front of you.

Name: Inspect
Description: Allows an aisling to study an item's attributes.

Name: nis
Description: Allows an aisling to check on Unora's current time.

Name: Assault
Description: An assail dealing small amount of damage to an enemy in front of you.

Name: Stab
Description: Deals minor damage to an enemy in front of you.

Name: Study Creature
Description: Allows the Rogue to study a creature's attributes.

Name: Peek
Description: Allows an aisling to look at another's inventory.

Name: Throw Smokebomb
Description: Allows the Rogue to throw a smokebomb to blind enemies nearby.

Name: Throw Surigum
Description: Deals minor damage to four enemies in front of you.

Name: Sap Needle
Description: Minor damage. Steals 10% mana to split between your group, capped at 20%.

Name: Amnesia
Description: Removes the creature's focus.

Name: Pierce
Description: Deals damage two tiles in front of you and adds AC to the target.

Name: Blitz
Description: Second assail that deals damage to enemies four spaces in front of you. Replaces Throw Surigum.

Name: Poison Bomb
Description: Allows the Rogue to throw a poison bomb that poisons enemies nearby.

Name: Throw
Description: Allows an aisling to throw an entity away from them.

Name: Gut
Description: Deals moderate damage to the enemy in front of you.

Name: Stab and Twist
Description: Deals damage to the target in front of you.

Name: Smoke Screen
Description: Creates a cloud of smoke blinding enemies three spaces around you.

Name: Barrage
Description: Third assail that deals damage to enemies four spaces in front of you.

Name: Skewer
Description: Deals great damage three tiles in front of you and increases target AC. Replaces Pierce.

Name: Sense
Description: Allows the rogue to see another's stats.

Name: Multi Strike
Description: Delivers attacks to several enemies. Pure only.

Name: Shadow Figure
Description: Allows the Rogue to obtain and keep a tactical advantage on an enemy. Pure only.

Name: Midnight Slash
Description: Master Rogue assail.

Name: Nightfall Strike
Description: Executes an enemy below 10% health. Does not work on bosses.

Name: Stab Twice
Description: Deals moderate damage to the enemy in front of you.

Name: Frost Bomb
Description: Freezes enemies within four spaces of you. Only works on monsters.

Name: Surigum Blitz
Description: Throws your surigum, dealing damage in a cone.

Name: Assassin Strike
Description: Deals more damage to higher health targets; chance to kill a target instantly (monster only, does not work on bosses).
